flavourText: "Exiled to the sea; what a joke.
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Roth's Reach

flavourText: It's said to be noble to stand one's ground.
To soak the earth in stalwart blood.
While the First Ones chose to laugh and run
and caper with untamed glee.
- The Wolven King

descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

explicitMods: 49% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Tempest Barb

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Behemoth Spike

flavourText: You've no reason for fear when you're a root in a fen
- Old Ezomyte saying.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Fencoil

implicitMods: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
flavourText: Fear blisters the heart and thins the blood.
Fear squeezes lungs and sets the guts to fester.
Fear is the wound left untended.

An off-white grin, an elegant bruise.
To the nascent scourge she sings the ruse:
"With me in hand, what else need you use?"

30% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

flavourText: Nothing is pure.
Slice open the Innocent
And spill a thousand Sins.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Roth's Reach

- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

To soak the earth in stalwart blood.

and caper with untamed glee.
- The Wolven King

explicitMods: 1% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
17.3 Life Regenerated per second per Endurance Charge

An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Hungry Abyss

flavourText: Darkness can never be sated.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Goddess Bound
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
30% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
flavourText: She paints her offer in wicked hues
An off-white grin, an elegant bruise.
To the nascent scourge she sings the ruse:
"With me in hand, what else need you use?"

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Chitus' Needle
